attributes.action: to accept Joanna Lumley as our new Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joanna Lumley is obviously much prettier than the present Prime Minister and has much more understanding as to what the people want.  So it would cost £1billion+ to allow Gurkha settlement- as our government have already propped up a thieving banking system, and suuport terrosist activity by letting all and sundry into this country (then giving them social security benefits), what is a mere £1billion+ to support loyal solidiers of this country?  Step down Mr Brown, you've lost the plot.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
